text: "You'll Be in My Heart" is a song by Phil Collins, from the 1999 Disney movie Tarzan. ==Awards== The song won Best Original Song at the 2000 Academy Awards. ==Personnel== * Phil Collins – vocals, drums * Rob Cavallo – acoustic guitar * Mark Goldenberg, Tim Pierce, Michael Thompson – electric guitar * Larry Muhoberac – piano, keyboards * John Pierce – bass guitar * Luis Conte, Will Donovan – percussion ==Charts and certifications== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1999) Peak position Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 69 Iceland (Íslenski Listinn Topp 40) 35 Poland (LP3) 21 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1999) Position Canada Adult Contemporary (RPM) 3 ===Certifications=== ==References== Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songs Category:Phil Collins songs Category:Disney Renaissance songs Category:Tarzan (Disney) Category:1999 songs
title: You'll Be in My Heart
